title: AI (Artificial Intelligence)
definition: Simulation of human intelligence in machines programmed to think, learn, and solve problems.
relevance: The core technology driving the need for GEO; optimizing for AI ensures your content is understood and prioritized by these systems.

title: Authoritativeness (E-E-A-T)
definition: A critical factor in Google's Quality Rater Guidelines emphasizing Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness.
relevance: Building demonstrable authority in your niche is paramount for AI-driven content ingestion and ranking.
